product_name: Sea to Summit Trek and Travel Body Wash - 3 fl. oz.
long_description: Ideal for traveling and camping, the compact Sea to Summit Trek and Travel body wash slips easily into a toiletry bag or backpack pocket. Trek and Travel body wash is biodegradable and phosphate free; concentrated formula only requires a cap full of body wash for a normal wash. Body wash has a light green tea fragrance. Suitable for both fresh and saltwater. 3 fl. oz. container is compliant with TSA carry-on luggage regulations.
short_description: Ideal for traveling and camping, the compact Sea to Summit Trek and Travel body wash slips easily into a toiletry bag or backpack pocket.
